JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Responsibilities      Should be able to use Inheritance, Polymorphism during ClassInterface Design.    Should understand SOLID Design Principles, Design Patterns.    Should be able to build SP in SQL Query Tuning and code tuning    Build and Promote the software to Dev and QA Environments    Mentor Junior Developers in both Technical and functional domains.    Apply programming tools, procedures, functions, and routines towards delivering the assigned task or activity with little or no guidance.    Should Identify areas to improve in terms of Development Practices    Should have participated in, and be familiar with, Agile (Scrum) project methodologies
